document.full_text: an investigative report from albania sheds more light on the routes by which weapons from cold war stockpiles have found  their way to libya and how the arms that have helped destabilize africa reached african soil.
document.title: at war: qaddafi's arms bazaar, slowly exposed
lines_and_colors: an investigative report from albania sheds more light on the routes by which weapons from cold war stockpiles have found  their way to libya and how the arms that have helped destabilize africa reached african soil.
